purpose: To enhance security, manage workspaces, and support multiplexing within AI agentic frameworks
principle: Utilizes Python-based security protocols and workspace management techniques to ensure safe and efficient operation of AI agents
reusability: Offers modular components that can be integrated into existing AI frameworks, with a focus on security and workspace management
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited support for complex agent frameworks, and potential security vulnerabilities may exist
name: codegate
description: CodeGate: Security, Workspaces and Multiplexing for AI Agentic Frameworks
highlight: Provides enhanced security and multiplexing for AI agent frameworks
